title: 1999/281/EC: Council Decision of 22 April 1999 appointing a member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 22 April 1999
appointing a member of the Committee of the Regions
(1999/281/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 198a thereof,
Having regard to Council Decision 98/110/EC of 26 January 1998(1) appointing members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions,
Whereas a seat as a member of the committee has become vacant following the resignation of Mr Rembert Behrendt, which was notified to the Council on 23 March 1999;
Having regard to the proposal from the German Government,
main_body: Mr Werner Ballhausen is hereby appointed a member of the Committee of the Regions in place of Mr Rembert Behrendt for the remainder of his term of office, which runs until 25 January 2002.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 22 April 1999.
For the Council
The President
W. MĂLLER
